content:
PROCEDURE CODE
1217
At the opening of the operations, the liquidating notary determines with all the parties all or part of the timetable for the continuation of the judicial partition, unless they waive the determination of such timetable.
The agreed deadlines are recorded in the minutes of the opening of operations or in subsequent minutes, in the case of deadlines agreed during the course of the proceedings. Each report shall state the date and time of the next transaction or the period within which it is to take place.
